main event: Mrs. U. S. Hignite observed a large, bright unidentified flying object with many green and blue lights near Beech Corner, Idaho on November 16, 1967.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 30 seconds,The object was observed at 6:15 p.m. while driving,The sky was clear but it was dark,The object glided down to about 30 feet off the ground as it approached,It had no discernible sound during the observation.
sighted object: a large, bright object with green and blue lights
witness description: Mrs. U. S. Hignite, driving alone at the time of the sighting
